about_the_game:
Welcome to Beauty Empire Tycoon – a business simulator where you run an elite beauty salon! Equip stylish work areas, hire the best specialists and offer clients premium services to become the main beauty tycoon in the city.

Full range of services

Offer your clients everything they could want – haircuts, coloring, manicures, pedicures, massages and spa treatments. The more services you have in your arsenal, the more satisfied clients and profits from their visits!

Salon customization

Create a unique atmosphere in the salon, where every corner is thought out to the smallest detail. Choose stylish furniture, create comfortable work areas and select accessories that will emphasize the atmosphere of luxury and coziness.

Hire professionals

Select the best specialists, monitor their work and help them develop. The higher the level of specialists, the more clients want to get into your salon!

Develop your business and earn money

Set prices, purchase premium products, launch marketing campaigns and attract new clients. Manage finances and make strategic decisions to increase profits and expand the network of salons!

Become the main salon in the city

Reputation and customer reviews are what matters! Satisfy the needs of the most demanding visitors, attract VIP clients and become the number one salon in your city.

Ready to build a beauty empire? Start your journey in Beauty Empire Tycoon right now!

Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Offer in-depth services like haircuts, coloring, and spa treatments tailored to your clients’ needs. Launch marketing campaigns, attract VIP clients and build your reputation!
